article.name: Persuasion
article.contents: Uses: - Convince someone to do something, tell you something, etc - Convince someone of a lie or fabrication - Make someone feel a desired emotion - Convince someone to agree to something
article.bodyHtml:
Uses:

  • Convince someone to do something, tell you something, etc
  • Convince someone of a lie or fabrication
  • Make someone feel a desired emotion
  • Convince someone to agree to something
